title: Need a help...
body: Hi guys!As seen in title i need help...and its about visa card payment and buying skins...First problem is i will pay first time now and when i want it say i need to write card holder...So i shoult write my real name or?Second is that i worry about if my visa card expiry date is for exaple for 2 months does tha mean i will have rp until only that day for 2 months or not?Also i wonder which skin to buy for under 1350 rp after i buy guardian of the sands kha?Sorry for long post...

replies.body:
No worries about the long post! 

For the cardholder field for a gift card make sure to put the name that is on the card itself. As for the expiration date, that will not effect how long you have to use the RP you buy. Once you buy any RP, you're free to use it whenever you want. It will never expire or go away.

If you're looking for a good skin for ol' Kha'Zix, I personally love Mecha Kha'zix and Dark Star Kha'zix. Guardian of the Sands is a really sweet one too!!
Thanks for replying,you really helped me!
